p.s: The movie The Hate U Give by George Tillmann Jr. which is based on the book with the same title by Angie Thomas, was released in 2018.
It's about a black girl called Starr who deals, besides the problems of every teenager with racism.
The given excerpt takes place in Williamson Prep School where both Starr and her white boyfriend Chris go to school.
They are in a fight because Chris overstepped a boundary by having a condom, although Starr said she's not ready yet.
In the given scene Chris comes up to Starr (who's at her locker) to say sorry.
At first Starr is still angry but after he dances in front of the other students to a beat he made for her, she forgives him.
